docs.snippet: Nigeria declared an air pollution emergency in a major southern city on Tuesday and closed an asphalt plant there after residents complained about the fumes from its furnaces, in a country plagued by corruption and poor governance....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nigeria declared an air pollution emergency in a major southern city on Tuesday and closed an asphalt plant there after residents complained about the fumes from its furnaces, in a country plagued by corruption and poor governance.

headline.main: Nigeria Declares Pollution in Southern City an Emergency, Closes Plant

docs.snippet: The U.S. National Weather Service said on Tuesday it suffered its first-ever outage of its data system during Monday's blizzard in New England, keeping the agency from sending out forecasts and warnings for more than two hours....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. National Weather Service said on Tuesday it suffered its first-ever outage of its data system during Monday's blizzard in New England, keeping the agency from sending out forecasts and warnings for more than two hours.

headline.main: U.S. Weather Service Says Hit by First-Ever Data System Outage
headline.print_headline: U.S. Weather Service Says Hit by First-Ever Data System Outage
